name: Shelter Skelter!
description:
Woof, Whimper, Whine - another busy day at the shelter!

Shelter Skelter is a vivid task management game placing you in charge of your very own dog shelter, tending to dogs as they get adopted or given up.

All these dogs and so much to do, can you keep up with the tasks needed to take care of them and keep them adoptable?

See for yourself what a shelter dog's life can really be like as you try to keep the shelter running with the staff you have on hand!
